tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to sit down (specifically as judge. in ambush, in quiet); by implication, to dwell, to remain; causatively, to settle, to marry

tokens.resolved_gloss: Jehudah (or Judah), the name of five Israelites; also of the tribe descended from the first, and of its territory

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)

tokens.resolved_gloss: a city (a place guarded by waking or a watch) in the widest sense (even of a mere encampment or post)
